mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hand Crafted Chest of Drawers
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A hand crafted chest of drawers crafted by Adam Harter Slusher circa 1900. This chest features four draws and is made with a variety of wood species. The chest is on loan thanks to Lauren Slusher Wood, the granddaughter of the maker. The chest was restored by Jeffery Austin Slusher, grandson of the maker.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: House furnishings
Furniture
Chests
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
